release.description: XSD import and export. Maven archetype. Other additions and fixes.
release.action: Rename XSD remove "-lax".
Disable caching of generated web pages.
Add use case notes section.
Add data attribute status conditional.
Add data structure categories.
Add use case type for design use cases, incl. icons.
Move stakeholders and interests before preconditions.
Add export of data structures into XSD files.
Add import of XSD files into data structures.
Add support for glossary.
Switch generated site to Twitter Bootstrap.
Add data structure attribute references.
Add references to requirement from descriptions.
Add use case description.
Add support for attachments.
Add support for requirements.
Rename "use case" in Czech translation from Scenar to Pripad uziti.
Change the type of collection attribute from custom yes/no to standard XSD boolean true/false.
Add favicon to generated use case pages.
Add tutorial to site.
Fix step handle type in XSD: limit allowed characters. Minus character was allowed but was interpreted as interval of steps in step reference. Step reference type amended accordingly.
Add support for length on data attributes of all types.
Format UC steps and conditions indented by step number.
Update css: no empty lines around HTML ul and ol.
Add use cases name on the index page and single page.
Support XHTML elements in source files, use default XML namespace.
Show version on single page overview.
Refactor index page.
Change font to sans serif.
Fix displaying of image alt texts on Firefox.
Allow multiple descriptions on data structure.
Add actor description (multiple).
Change XML namespace to new project URL.
Every actor must be defined.
Attribute status hint.
Support attribute status display-only and natural-key.
